name: 20-Ton Mobile Crane
desc: Ideal for small construction projects and tight urban spaces. Highly maneuverable and efficient.

name: Crawler Crane 50-Ton
desc: Perfect for long-term heavy lifting on construction and infrastructure sites.

name: Hydraulic Truck Crane
desc: Versatile and road-ready for quick deployment. Great for mid-range lifting tasks.

name: Tower Crane
desc: Used for tall building construction. Maximum height and heavy-duty performance.

name: Rough Terrain Crane 35-Ton
desc: Designed for off-road and rugged environments. Strong lifting power with stability.
